about_the_game:
Your Average Bear is a stealth comedy about a black bear trying to sneakily part campers from their food. This game was developed as part of the University of Utah's EAE Program 2022-2023 Capstone Course, in which students form small studios and develop a game from start to finish, ideation phase to full release, in only two semesters.

After moving into the scenic woods of Your Average Campground, this black bear needs to prove himself to his new neighbors, and what better way to do so than to bring them the human foods their hearts desire? With the use of an animal-exclusive food-delivery app, take orders from your fellow animals, use your tools to evade campers and rangers, steal the delectable treats, and bring them back to your creature customers, all without getting caught! Are you up to the challenge?

Features:

  • A comedic take on the stealth genre
  • Unique bear- and nature-themed abilities
  • Unique bear- and nature-themed food delivery app (Just 1)
  • A fun, low-poly, simplified art style
  • Him


Title/header font used: “Vanilla Extract” by Shara Weber () from FontSpace (), licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution.

highlighted.name: Does UBear Deliver in The Woods?

Your Average Bear is a stealth comedy about a black bear trying to sneakily part campers from their food. name: Your Average Bear

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8750 (2.2GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 with 6GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10750H (2.6GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 with 8GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • VR Support: N/A

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Atos criminosos
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Become the sneakiest bear in The Average National Park — Accept delivery orders from your fellow animals, collect the food with the help of various tools, and hand them off without getting caught!
